text: Beyonce is pregnant with twins, as everybody on the planet knows by now. And according to a new report, Beyonce also wants to built a million dollar nursery for these twins. Okay, actually, Beyonce and Jay - Z want to build this nursery. But let ’ s be real – if Beyonce wants something, you think Jay - Z is going to say no? And also, when was the last time we saw Jay - Z claiming to want something, and Beyonce jumping on that bandwagon? And don ’ t say a divorce # neverforgetthelevatorincident. Anyway, Radar ’ s source claims, “ Beyonce told Jay Z she wants a million - dollar nursery in her home! The place will have two of everything. It must have two lamps
